bookmark.query:
SELECT
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (
        order by
            sum
    )
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            date,
            sum(amount)
        FROM
            work
        WHERE
            date between '2024-04-01'
            and '2024-06-07'
            and branch = 'MP'
        GROUP by
            date
    )

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN date = 7 THEN 'Воскресенье'
        WHEN date = 1 THEN 'Понедельник'
        WHEN date = 2 THEN 'Вторник'
        WHEN date = 3 THEN 'Среда'
        WHEN date = 4 THEN 'Четверг'
        WHEN date = 5 THEN 'Пятница'
        WHEN date = 6 THEN 'Суббота'
        ELSE 'other'
    END,
    sum
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            date,
            SUM(sum)
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    EXTRACT(
                        ISODOW
                        from
                            date
                    ) as date,
                    sum(amount)
                FROM
                    work
                WHERE
                    date between '2024-04-01'
                    and '2024-04-30'
                    and branch = 'MP'
                GROUP BY
                    date
                ORDER by
                    date
            )
        GROUP by
            date
    )

SELECT
    ROUND(((SUM(amount) / 570.0) * 100), 2) AS percent
FROM
    supply

INSERT INTO
    supply  (date, amount, t_c)
VALUES
    ('2024-mm-dd', 180, 'OZON')

INSERT INTO
    work (date, number, place, amount, t_c, branch)
VALUES
    ('2024-mm-dd', NULL, 1, 1, 'CDEK', 'KF')
COPY work TO '/storage/emulated/0/git/Projekt/files/all.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER

SELECT
    *,
    ROUND((result * 880.952381), 2) as money
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            *,
            percent * coefficient AS result
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    *,
                    CASE
                        WHEN percent < 25.00 THEN 0.001
                        WHEN percent < 50.00 THEN 0.002
                        WHEN percent < 75.00 THEN 0.003
                        WHEN percent < 90.00 THEN 0.004
                        WHEN percent < 100.00 THEN 0.005
                        ELSE 0.006
                    END AS coefficient
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            date,
                            ROUND(((COUNT(place) -1.0) /(24.0 -1.0) * 100), 2) as percent
                        FROM
                            work
                        WHERE
                            branch = 'KF'
                            and date BETWEEN '2024-04-01'
                            AND '2024-04-05'
                        GROUP BY
                            date
                    ) AS p
            ) AS pp
    ) as pp
ORDER BY date

SELECT
    *,
    ROUND((result * 880.952381), 2) as money
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            *,
            percent * coefficient AS result
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    *,
                    CASE
                        WHEN percent < 25.00 THEN 0.001
                        WHEN percent < 50.00 THEN 0.002
                        WHEN percent < 75.00 THEN 0.003
                        WHEN percent < 90.00 THEN 0.004
                        WHEN percent < 100.00 THEN 0.005
                        ELSE 0.006
                    END AS coefficient
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            date,
                            ROUND(((SUM(place) -10.0) /(96.0 -10.0) * 100), 2) as percent
                        FROM
                            work
                        WHERE
                            branch = 'MP'
                            and date BETWEEN '2024-04-01'
                            AND '2024-04-05'
                        GROUP BY
                            date
                    ) AS p
            ) AS pp
    ) as pp
ORDER BY date

SELECT
    date,
    amount,
t_c
FROM
    work
WHERE
    date BETWEEN '2024-01-01'
    AND '2024-01-31' and branch = 'KF'
GROUP BY
    date,
    amount,
    t_c
ORDER BY
    date,
    t_c

SELECT
    date,
    place,
t_c
FROM
    work
WHERE
    date BETWEEN '2024-01-01'
    AND '2024-01-31' and branch = 'MP'
GROUP BY
    date,
    place,
    t_c
ORDER BY
    date,
    t_c

SELECT
    date AS Дата,
    number AS "Номер заказа",
    amount AS Количество,
    t_c AS "Транспортная компания"
FROM
    work
WHERE
    date BETWEEN '2024-04-01'
    AND '2024-04-05'
GROUP BY
    date,
    number,
    amount,
    t_c
ORDER BY
    date,
    t_c

INSERT INTO
    work (date, number, place, amount, t_c, branch)
VALUES
    ('2024-mm-dd', NULL, 1, 1, 'OZON', 'MP')

SELECT
    date,
    number,
    amount,
    t_c
FROM
    work
WHERE
    date BETWEEN '2024-01-01'
    AND '2024-01-31'
GROUP BY
    date,
    number,
    amount,
    t_c
ORDER BY
    date,
    t_c
